name: IQNet - The International Certification Association
boss: Carlos Pedro De Castro Fernandes Alves
goal:
Established since 1990, IQNet is an international network of leading certification bodies. Currently the network consists of 35 partner certification bodies (IQNet partners) and 2 affiliated bodies, operating worldwide, who share IQNet harmonised certification principles and methodologies.
IQNet Association - The International Certification Network, is an international non-governmental and non-profit association, established under the civil laws of Switzerland (article 60 ss of the Swiss Civil Code, CC). The legal seat of the Association is Bern/Switzerland.

Through dedicated committees, processes and tools, IQNet partners benefit from:
• Business cooperation
• Harmonisation initiatives
• Best practice sharing
• Knowledge dissemination
• Innovation enhancement and proliferation

IQNet partners hold accreditations from more than 40 accreditation bodies. In conjunction with this, mutual recognition of partners’ certificates provides substantial benefits to national and international customers certified through IQNet partners; facilitating trade and commerce globally

Main IQNet Objectives are:
• Intensify representation, liaisons and lobbying activities and further develop relations with relevant stakeholders
• Expand the network to new CB’s and consolidate the membership processes
• Enhance knowledge transfer and technical cooperation to partners
• Strive for the sustainability of IQNet product portfolio
• Promote efficient services to partners
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Trade
euInitiatives:
Main EU initiatives and activities of interest are:
* Quality and Environment
* CE Marking and new Approach directives
* Product and Management Systems Certification
* Facilitating Trade
* Consumers Protection
* Social Responsibility issues
* Sustainability and Business continuity
* Energy Management
* Anti-bribery
